title: Population growth in Mexico 2018
yAxis: Population growth compared to the previous year
summary: Overall Population growth compared to the previous year has decreased over the Year.
Population growth compared to the previous year is slightly decreasing from 2009 to 2010.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2009 and 2010.
The highest Population growth compared to the previous year, of value 1.48 was reached at Year 2009
Minimum Population growth compared to the previous year about 1.44 was reached at Year 2010
min_summary: Overall Population growth compared to the previous year has decreased over the Year.
Population growth compared to the previous year is slightly decreasing from 2009 to 2010.
mid_summary: In general Population growth compared to the previous year has stayed the same over the Year.
Population growth compared to the previous year is slightly decreasing from 2009 to 2010.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2009 and 2010.
The highest Population growth compared to the previous year, of value 1.48 was reached at Year 2009
Minimum Population growth compared to the previous year about 1.44 was reached at Year 2010
